tooltips.statusHeader: Online hosts will respond to a live query. Offline hosts won't respond to a live query because they may be shut down, asleep, or not connected to the internet.
tooltips.mdmStatus: Settings can be updated remotely on hosts with MDM turned on. To filter by MDM status, head to the Dashboard page.
tooltips.mdmServerUrl: The MDM server that updates settings on the host. To filter by MDM server URL, head to the Dashboard page.
tooltips.publicIpAddress: The IP address the host uses to connect to Fleet.
tooltips.lastFetched: The last time the host reported vitals.
tooltips.lastSeen: The last time the host was online.
tooltips.pendingHost: This host was ordered using Apple Business Manager (ABM). You will see host vitals when it is enrolled in Fleet

empty.title: No hosts found
empty.description: No hosts match the current filters
empty.addFirst: Add your first host to get started

deleteHostModal.title: Delete host
deleteHostModal.description: This will remove the record of {{hostText}} and associated data such as unlock PINs and disk encryption keys.
deleteHostModal.manyHostsWarning: When deleting a large volume of hosts, it may take some time for this change to be reflected in the UI.
deleteHostModal.reappearWarning: macOS, Windows, or Linux hosts will re-appear unless Fleet's agent is uninstalled.
deleteHostModal.mobileWarning: iOS and iPadOS hosts will re-appear unless MDM is turned off. It may take up to an hour to re-appear.

runScriptBatchModal.title: Run script
runScriptBatchModal.noScripts: No scripts available for this team
runScriptBatchModal.runDescription: Run a script on {{count}} host, or schedule a script to run on targeted hosts in the future.
runScriptBatchModal.runDescription_plural: Run a script on {{count}} hosts, or schedule a script to run on targeted hosts in the future.
runScriptBatchModal.scheduleTooltip: Enter a date and time to schedule this script.
runScriptBatchModal.errorTooManyHosts: Could not run script: too many hosts targeted. Please try again with fewer hosts.

filterBlock.hostsAffectedByCve: Hosts affected by the specified CVE.
filterBlock.munkiIssueTooltip: Hosts that reported this Munki issue the last time Munki ran on each host.
filterBlock.lowDiskSpaceTooltip: Hosts that have {{gb}} GB or less disk space available.
filterBlock.mdmAutomatic: MDM was turned on automatically. IT admins can block end users from turning MDM off.
filterBlock.mdmManual: MDM was turned on manually. End users can turn MDM off.
filterBlock.mdmPending: Hosts ordered using Apple Business Manager (ABM). They will automatically enroll to Fleet and turn on MDM when they're unboxed.

about.title: About
about.enrollmentIdTooltip: Enrollment ID is a unique identifier for personal hosts. Personal (BYOD) devices don't report their serial numbers. The Enrollment ID changes with each enrollment.
about.publicIpTooltip: The IP address the host uses to connect to Fleet.

activity.title: Activity
activity.tooltip: Failure of one activity won't cancel other activities.

policies.title: Policies
policies.notSupported: Policies are not supported for this host
policies.interestedIos: Interested in detecting device health issues on iPhones?
policies.interestedIpados: Interested in detecting device health issues on iPads?
policies.interestedAndroid: Interested in detecting device health issues on Android hosts?
policies.noPoliciesDevice: No policies are checked on your device
policies.noPoliciesHost: No policies are checked for this host
policies.expectingPoliciesDevice: Expecting to see policies? Try selecting "Refetch" to ask your device to report new vitals.
policies.expectingPoliciesHost: Expecting to see policies? Try selecting "Refetch" to ask this host to report new vitals.

queries.title: Queries
queries.scheduledNotSupported: Scheduled queries are not supported for this host
queries.notSupported: Queries are not supported for this host
queries.interestedChromebooks: Interested in collecting data from your Chromebooks?
queries.noScheduledQueries: No queries are scheduled to run on this host
queries.expectingQueries: Expecting to see queries? Try selecting Refetch to ask this host to report fresh vitals.
